item.title: Xbox One S - The ultimate games and entertainment system
item.description:
Xbox One S - The ultimate games and entertainment system

Play the greatest games lineup on the highly-anticipated Xbox One S, the first and only console with 4K Ultra HD Blu-ray, 4K video streaming, and High Dynamic Range support for games and video. Available August 2nd.

item.title: Mafia III - E3 2016 Accolades Trailer
item.description:
Mafia III - E3 2016 Accolades Trailer

With over 60 E3 accolades, 12 awards and a host of top-ten recognitions, Mafia III is poised to be Fall's Most Promising Open-World Game. https://store.xbox.com/en-US/Xbox-One/Bundle/Mafia-III-PreOrder-Bundle/6b6e8d3d-f393-4698-ba27-6d6ed090b931

item.title: Prison Architect: Xbox One Edition Launch Trailer
item.description:
Prison Architect: Xbox One Edition Launch Trailer

Take control of the building and running of a maximum security prison as the critically acclaimed lock-em-up arrives on Xbox One today! In Prison Architect you will see the impact of your grand design on the lives of your inmates be it a utopic centre for rehabilitation, a brutal Super Max Prison or anything in between.

item.title: Ark: Survival Evolved: Redwood Biome and Spotlight: Titanosaur!
item.description:
Ark: Survival Evolved: Redwood Biome and Spotlight: Titanosaur!

Take refuge among the Redwood trees with new Wood and Metal Tree Platforms! Live like a Furry Forest Creature in these massive trees! Tap into the massive redwoods to extract their sap for healthy concoctions using the new Tree Sap Taps. Reach new heights with the Retractable Rope Ladders.

item.title: Mantis Burn Racing Announcement Trailer
item.description:
Mantis Burn Racing Announcement Trailer

The race is on in Mantis Burn Racing, where fast-paced bumper-to-bumper racing combines with intuitive, tactile gameplay and stunning visuals in one of the best-looking and immersive top-down racers around. Coming soon to Xbox One.

item.title: Gaming is better with Xbox Live Gold
item.description:
Gaming is better with Xbox Live Gold

Gaming is better with Xbox Live Gold. Join the best community of gamers on the most advanced multiplayer network. Get four free games a month, worth up to $700 a year, and save up to 50-75% in the Xbox Store. Learn more at http://www.xbox.com/en-US/live/gold?xr=shellnav.

item.title: This Week on Xbox: July 8 , 2016
item.description:
This Week on Xbox: July 8 , 2016

This week's headlines include the release of Red Dead Redemption through Backward Compatibility for Xbox One, a new look at Ark: Survival Evolved, the Ultimate Game Sale and more.

item.title: FIFA 17 Cover Vote - Your Cover. Your Call.
item.description:
FIFA 17 Cover Vote - Your Cover. Your Call.

Four of the best talents in world football - James Rodriguez, Anthony Martial, Marco Reus, and Eden Hazard. One global FIFA 17 cover star. YOUR COVER. YOUR CALL.

item.title: Xbox One E3 2016 - A new era of gaming
item.description:
Xbox One E3 2016 - A new era of gaming

With over 130 awards at E3 2016, and the biggest lineup of exclusives in Xbox history, there's never been a better time to game with Xbox One. Jump ahead.

item.title: Xbox - Project Scorpio
item.description:
Xbox - Project Scorpio

The most powerful console ever. Holiday 2017.
